note.p: Career: Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge; Lecturer in mathematics
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 467-482, plate, by E A Milne
References: Brebis Bleaney, 'The Physical Sciences in Oxford, 1918-1939 and Earlier' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 247-261
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
